content: Ohhhh, honey! I’m so sorry — I know that feeling, too. I came back from my first trip overseas months early because I missed people and all sorts of crazy things: brown bread, my own bed, ice in my drinks… (This was also pre-cell phones, which didn’t help.) It gets easier, I promise. But I am just so very proud of you for going at all, and I’m sending you a virtual hug every day. ❤❤❤
